name: PixiTouch
description: A PixiJS compatible touch event interface that extends the standard DOM Touch interface. Provides additional properties to normalize touch input with mouse/pointer events. ```ts // Access touch information sprite.on('touchstart', (event) => { // Standard touch properties console.log('Touch position:', event.clientX, event.clientY); console.log('Touch ID:', event.pointerId); // Additional PixiJS properties console.log('Pressure:', event.pressure); console.log('Size:', event.width, event.height); console.log('Tilt:', event.tiltX, event.tiltY); }); ```

properties.name: button
properties.description: The button being pressed (0: left, 1: middle, 2: right)

properties.name: isPrimary
properties.description: Whether this is the primary touch point

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the touch contact area

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the touch contact area

properties.name: tiltX
properties.description: The angle of tilt along the x-axis (in degrees)

properties.name: tiltY
properties.description: The angle of tilt along the y-axis (in degrees)

properties.name: pointerType
properties.description: The type of pointer that triggered this event

properties.name: pointerId
properties.description: Unique identifier for this touch point

properties.name: pressure
properties.description: The normalized pressure of the pointer (0 to 1)

properties.name: twist
properties.description: The rotation angle of the pointer (e.g., pen)

properties.name: tangentialPressure
properties.description: The normalized tangential pressure of the pointer

properties.name: layerX
properties.description: The x coordinate relative to the current layer

properties.name: layerY
properties.description: The y coordinate relative to the current layer

properties.name: offsetX
properties.description: The x coordinate relative to the target's offset parent

properties.name: offsetY
properties.description: The y coordinate relative to the target's offset parent

properties.name: isNormalized
properties.description: Whether the event was normalized by PixiJS

properties.name: event
https
properties.type:
//dom.spec.whatwg.org/#event} DOM Event Specification
 * @see {@link FederatedPointerEvent} For pointer-specific events
 * @see {@link FederatedMouseEvent} For mouse-specific events
 * @see {@link FederatedWheelEvent} For wheel-specific events
 * @category events
 * @standard
 */
export class FederatedEvent<N extends UIEvent | PixiTouch = UIEvent | PixiTouch> implements UIEvent
{
    /** Flags whether this event bubbles. This will take effect only if it is set before propagation. */
    public bubbles = true
